node.doctext:
[% use POSIX; return "".encodeHTML($$USER{title})."\n". "".asctime(localtime).""; %] [% return "" if ($$USER{user_id} == $HTMLVARS{guest_user}); my $str; my $catch = htmlcode('borgcheck'); $str.="".(($$VARS{borged})?("borged"):("unborged")).""; my $rm = getNodeById($$USER{in_room}); $str.="".(($$USER{in_room} == 0)?(""):("$$rm{title}")).""; $str.=""; foreach(split('
',$$VARS{personal_nodelet})) { next unless $_; $str.="".encodeHTML($_)."" } $str.=""; $str.=htmlcode("shownewexp", "TRUE,xml"); #####Stolen from general container $DB->sqlInsert("iplog", {iplog_user => $$USER{user_id}, iplog_ipaddy =>$ENV{REMOTE_ADDR}}) unless ($$VARS{ipaddy} eq $ENV{REMOTE_ADDR} || $$USER{user_id} == $HTMLVARS{'guest_user'}); $$VARS{ipaddy} = $ENV{REMOTE_ADDR}; #$$VARS{votetime} = "" if not $$VARS{votetest1}; my ($time) = split " ",$$USER{lasttime}; if ($$USER{node_id} != $HTMLVARS{guest_user} and (not exists $$VARS{votetime} or $$VARS{votetime} ne $time)) { use Everything::Experience; my $VOTES = getVars(getNode('level votes', 'setting')); my $COOLS = getVars(getNode('level cools', 'setting')); my $lvl = getLevel $USER; if (exists $$VOTES{$lvl} and $$VOTES{$lvl} =~ /^\d+$/) { #$$VARS{votetest1} = "hay"; $$USER{votesleft} = $$VOTES{$lvl}; } #$$USER{votesleft} = $$VOTES{$lvl}; if (exists $$COOLS{$lvl} and $$COOLS{$lvl} =~ /^\d+$/) { #$$VARS{votetest2} = "nay"; $$VARS{cools} = $$COOLS{$lvl}; } $$VARS{votesrefreshed} ||= 0; $$VARS{votesrefreshed}++; $$VARS{votetime} = $time; } ##### $str.="".(($$VARS{cools})?($$VARS{cools}):("0")).""; $str.="".$$USER{votesleft}.""; $str.="".$$USER{karma}.""; $str.="".$$USER{experience}.""; $str.="".(($$VARS{numwriteups})?($$VARS{numwriteups}):("0")).""; my $userlock = $DB->sqlSelectHashref('*', 'nodelock', "nodelock_node=$$USER{user_id}"); $str.=""; $str.=encodeHTML($$userlock{nodelock_reason})if ($userlock); $str.=""; return $str; %]
node.title: Personal Session XML Ticker
